pages.text: Be aware that flint tools are now the early game starting toolset and wood tools are completely removed.  While stone tools still exist as a minor upgrade, be aware they are now constructed with smooth stone double-cooked in a furnance

This is because pebbles and twigs are now common in many biomes, and pebbles can be crafted into cobblestone.  With enough collecting and a bit of creativity, you could skip flint entirely, but is that really what you want to do?
